content: repeat from * once more 72 sts round 24 *k1 p2 k1 p2 k4 3 times p2 k3 p2 k1 repeat from * once more row 2 work all knit and purl stitches as they present themselves round 25 *k1 p2 k2 p2 k4 3 times p2 k2 p2 k1 repeat from * once more all sizes for 2nd size only change to a 2 5mm short circular needle 80cm circular needle for magic loop or divide the stitches across dpns and round 1 *p1 k2 p1 k3 p2 k4 3 times p2 k1 p1 k2 p1 join into a circle place marker you will sew up the small gap repeat from * once more 64 sts where you knitted the first two row later round 2 *p1 k2 p1 k4 p2 3 times k4 p3 k2 p1 repeat from * cont in rib as set for your size for 14 more rounds once more round 3 *p1 k2 p2 k4 4 times p2 k2 p1 repeat from * once more leg round 4 *p1 k2 p3 k4 p2 3 times k4 p1 k2 p1 repeat from * using either the written instructions or charts for your size once more and starting at round 1 work pattern as instructed for each sock round 5 *p1 k2 p4 k4 p2 3 times k3 p1 k2 p1 repeat from * once more round 6 *p1 k2 p2 k1 p2 k4 3 times p2 k2 p1 twice repeat from * once more round 7 *p1 k2 p2 k2 p2 k4 3 times p2 k1 p1 k2 p1 repeat from * once more round 8 *p1 k2 p2 k3 p2 k4 3 times p3 k2 p1 repeat from * once more rnds 9 16 as round 3 round 17 *p1 k2 p3 k4 p2 3 times k3 p2 k2 p1 repeat from * once more 2 3 round 18 *p1 k2 p1 k1 p2 k4 3 times p2 k2 twice p1 for 4th size only repeat from * once more round 1 *k1 p2 k3 p2 k4 4 times p2 k1 twice repeat from * round 19 * p1 k2 twice p2 k4 3 times p2 k1 p2 k2 p1 once more 72 sts repeat from * once more round 2 *k1 p2 k4 5 times p4 k1 repeat from * once more round 20 *p1 k2 p1 k3 p2 k4 3 times p4 k2 p1 repeat from * round 3 *k1 p3 k4 p2 4 times k4 p3 k1 repeat from * once more once more round 21 as round 2 round 4 *k1 p4 k4 p2 5 times k1 repeat from * once more round 22 as round 3 round 5 *k1 p5 k4 p2 4 times k3 p2 k1 repeat from * round 23 as round 4 once more round 24 *p1 k2 p1 k1 p2 k4 3 times p2 k3 p1 k2 p1 round 6 *k1 p3 k1 p2 k4 4 times p2 k2 p2 k1 repeat from * repeat
